00037 
00038 Param::Param(const char* const STR_Keyword, const Help& CLI_Help)
00039   : SyntaxNode(STR_Keyword, CLI_Help),
00040     m_strValue(MAX_WORD_LENGTH),
00041     m_pcliCloned(NULL)
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 Param::~Param(void)
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 const tk::String Param::GetKeyword(void) const
00050 {
00051     if (! m_strValue.IsEmpty())
00052     {
00053         return GetstrValue();
00054     }
00055     else
00056     {
00057         return SyntaxNode::GetKeyword();
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 const bool Param::FindElements(
00062         Element::List& CLI_ExactList,
00063         Element::List& CLI_NearList,
00064         const char* const STR_Keyword
00065         ) const
00066 {
00067     if (GetCloned() != NULL)
00068     {
00069         return GetCloned()->FindElements(CLI_ExactList, CLI_NearList, STR_Keyword);
00070     }
00071     else
00072     {
00073         return SyntaxNode::FindElements(CLI_ExactList, CLI_NearList, STR_Keyword);
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 const tk::String Param::GetstrValue(void) const
00078 {
00079     return m_strValue;
00080 }
00081 
00082 const Param* const Param::GetCloned(void) const
00083 {
00084     return m_pcliCloned;
00085 }
00086 
00087 const bool Param::SetValue(const char* const STR_Value) const
00088 {
00089     if (m_strValue.Set(STR_Value))
00090     {
00091         return true;
00092 }
00093     else
00094     {
00095         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Could not store original string parameter value." << endl;
00096         return false;
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 const Param* const Param::InitClone(Param& CLI_Param) const
00101 {
00102     CLI_Param.SetCli(const_cast<Cli&>(GetCli()));
00103     CLI_Param.SetstrValue(GetstrValue());
00104     CLI_Param.SetCloned(*this);
00105     return & CLI_Param;
00106 }
00107 
00108 const bool Param::SetCloned(const Param& CLI_Cloned)
00109 {
00110     m_pcliCloned = & CLI_Cloned;
00111     return true;
00112 }
